item.description:
It's time for the annual faculty-staff holiday luncheon at the Chase Center in Carmichael Hall. This year's menu looks great including:

Starters: Sampling of New England Cheeses and Savory Duck Rillette; Spiced Nuts, Cornichons, and Whole Grain Mustard; Basket of Fresh–Baked Seasonal Breads & Sweet Cream Butter

1st Course: House Smoked Salmon, English Cucumbers, Pomegranate Crème Fraîche and Mache

2nd Course: Creamy Parsnip Bisque, Port Reduction and Crispy Parsnip Chips

Choice of Entrée
(1) Braised Beef Short Ribs, Celery Root Pureé and Roasted Baby Carrots
~or~
(2) Olive Oil Poached Halibut, Herbed Fingerling Potatoes and Warm Fennel Blood Orange Salad
~or~
(3) Butternut Squash, Ricotta and Caramelized Red Onion Lasagna (v), Braised Winter Greens and a Pistachio Emulsion

Dessert Course: Warm Sticky Toffee Pudding, Caramel and Vanilla Bean Ice Cream

Enjoy our complimentary Wine Tasting presentation showcasing a selection of wines
suitable for your holiday entertaining.

The cost is $17.95 per person ~ all inclusive and can be paid after lunch to the Chase Center Cashier by Cash or Check. We will also throw in a couple of bucks each for a tip, but the total cost of the meal should be much less than $25 which is a fantastic value.

PLEASE NOTE: when RSVPing, please indicate your choice of entree. You can change your mind, but we want to give Tufts Catering an idea of how many of each entree to prepare so even if you're not sure, just pick one that you are leaning towards. Thanks.
item.name: Holiday Luncheon
